filename.description: The filename of the calendar in `data/calendars/` or a URL to a calendar.

id.description: Which bit in a merged calendar bitmask that the calendar corresponds to, from least significant. An id of -1 means that the calendar is always hidden and cannot be merged.

order.description: The position in the picker relative to other calendars, lower numbers are shown first.

category.description: The category of the calendar. Subcategories are delimited by `/`.

hidden.description: If true, the calendar will not be shown in the picker, but is still served in /c and can be merged.
